name: The House Full Of Tasks
description:
We didn't get all the features in, such as the intro cutscene (text pasted above), or showing all your items to various characters, although there was quite a bit of dialogue written for that. Some of our beautiful artists made models and assets that we didn't have time to get in, and some quest logic got simplified (and broken) at the last minute.

Everyone stayed up too damn late trying to complete this.

Thanks so much to all of you, I'm laughing my ass off!!!!

Happy spooky 9/11 day.

Credits: Zack (Zackarotto), Ben (Lecithin), Luke (lukehumphris, Keith (keithito), Tess, Nick, Andrew, Justin.
